name: (C) ESTAR HP FS (RTU, NG Heat)
_description: ENERGY STAR air source heat pump (w/ cold climates specs as applicable) fully replacing original NG RTU equipment

energy_efficiency_source.notes: ENERGY STAR V. 4.0 went into effect in January 2023 as reflected under 2023 column.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Administration

installed_cost_source.notes: ENERGY STAR costs in 2023 normalized by capacity.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

notes: Heating multiple of 92% was determined by dividing square feet in which main heating equipment is gas packaged unit (14491406 sf) by square feet in shiwch main heating equipment is gas furnace or packaged unit (176461522 sf)

cooling multiple of 60% was determined by dividing square feet in which cooling equipment is packaged AND heating equipment is natural gas (214306467 sf) by square feet with same cooling constraint and heating across all fuel types (357885079 sf).
